attributes.action: Protect UK Citizens' existing Freedom of Movement rights in Brexit negotiations
attributes.additional_details:
The Big EU Passport campaign was started in order to highlight the fact that the Freedom of Movement Rights of UK Citizens, who are currently EU Citizens, are not being prioritised in Brexit negotiations yet we currently have the Right to live and work in 31 countries.
 
Many people use this right in order to work in mainland EU yet live in the UK. Others want to maintain family connections.

For information about our campaign: http://breakingbrexit.blogspot.co.uk/2017/06/big-eu-passport.html
attributes.background: The UK Passport gives us, as EU Citizens, the Right to live and work in 28 EU Countries (& 3 EEA Countries). As UK Citizens, we do not want to lose this Right and ask that our Rights are fully protected and that they are valued and considered in any Brexit negotiations.
